version_description:
Feature:
- Our very first Limited-Time Events is Coming this week!

Bug Fix:
- Push Notifications sent repeatedly on short-interval for 'having enough money'
- App Icon's art distrotion
- Episode 5's dialogue text error
- Episode 10's dialogue text error

Misc:
- Replaced 'Denver Haze' character with 'Stony Rivers' (narrator character)

New Episodes will be added soon as well, so stay tuned!

Feature:
- Brand New 'Conspiracy' Event is Coming this week!
- 'Puff-Puff' In-game Currency has been replaced with 'Buds'

Bug Fix:
- Dave's Workshop header art cut-off in Business Collection menu
- General UI adjustments

Misc:
- Text fonts update for greater readability

Feature:
- NEW Episodes 26-30!
- 'Leaderboards' have been added - compete with your friends!
- New Prizes added for Weekend Events and Mini-Events

Technical:
- Increased game loading speed
- Text alignment in menu screens and story screens
- General polish and improvements in Art and UI quality.

Misc:
- Added Game Intro for new players; welcome!

Featured:
- *NEW* - Dabs, the adorable little armadillo, is taking over for Stoney Rivers! Look for Dabs and his TV set popping out of his burrow to earn FREE Buds for watching in-game ads.
- MORE ROOM has been made on the Home Screen to make way for new Characters and Prizes coming your way! No real trees were harmed in the process.

Bug Fix:
- Game loading times have been optimized.
- Addressed numerous bugs related to Limited Time Events.

Misc:
- Updated text font display on majority of in-game screens for improved legibility.

Featured:
- NEW A brand new MULTIPLIER for your Offline Earnings!
Step 1: Automate one or more of your businesses.
Step 2: ????? (Go offline and do something, bud!)
Step 3: Watch a video ad!
Step 4: $$$ Profit $$$
- NEW - The Title Screen has a brand new look!

Bug Fix:
- Game loading times have been optimized.
- Addressed numerous bugs related to the Main Game and Limited Time Events.

Hey farmers, here's a Hot Fix update to address the following bugs:

- 'Reload Game' error message after linking player account to Game Center.
- 2x Earnings Multiplier feature not functioning correctly with certain Businesses in Limited-Time Events.
- Occasionally being unable to dismiss the Welcome Back Multiplier feature screen during Story cut-scenes.

Many thanks for your patience and support!

Hey farmers!

Hope you’re enjoying your time on Las Flores Island! We’ve made some changes to Bud Farm: Idle Tycoon that we think you’ll enjoy:

-Leaderboard Rewards will begin in early December! Compete with other farmers in your Squad to earn the top prizes in Limited-Time Events!

-Save your in-game progress with the new Cloud Save feature! Sync your game data through the Settings menu (iOS Game Center) and back up your account now! Buying a new phone? With Cloud Save, your progress on Las Flores Island will come right back to ya, bud!

-We finished a UI overhaul! Hope you’ll enjoy the noticeably cleaner menu screens, updated colours, text fields, and more!

-Video ad related Bugs, notably for the Offline Earnings Multiplier and 2x Cash Bonus, have been addressed!

Thank you for your continued support and patience!

Hey Farmers!
Here’s our first update for you in 2020.

CHEST ODDS
- You can now view the drop rates of items from a Chest by tapping on the “Drop Info” button when previewing a Chest from the Store.

MAP SCREEN UPGRADE
- The bottom area of the main game map screen has been extended to make room for more Prizes… Wonder what they could be.

BUG FIXES
- Addressed bugs related to Businesses not earning cash.
- General graphic and miscellaneous bug fixes.

Thank you for your continued support - please be sure to check our weekly Bud Farm Buzz livestreams on Facebook for the latest news on upcoming updates!

Hey Farmers!
Here's the Hot-fix update to address the Automated Businesses reset issue.
Thanks for your patience!

Hey Farmers!
Sorry for the hiccup - here's a Hot-fix update that will address bugs related to collecting Cash from both automated and non-automated Businesses.
Thanks again for your patience!

Hello farmers!

NEW - REPEATERS are coming your way! These magical objects will generate items like Buds, Cards, and even Gems repeatedly, earning you some regular freebies!

NEW - The OFFERWALL provides opportunities to earn FREE Gems for completing tasks and surveys! Check it out in the Store!

Thank you for your continued support, bud!
